flavorText:
"I just felt a drip. It must be about to rain."

„War das ein Tropfen? Es wird wohl gleich regnen."
—Händler vom Steinstraßenmarkt, letzte Worte
foreignData.name: Kehlensucher

"Me ha caído una gota. Estará a punto de llover".

—Vendeur des halles de la rue Pavée, derniers mots
foreignData.name: Traqueur de gorge
foreignData.text: Les ninjas attaquants non-bloqués que vous contrôlez ont le lien de vie.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Ho appena sentito una goccia. Credo stia per piovere."
—Venditore del Mercato di Vicolo della Pietra, ultime parole

――小石通りの露天商、最後の言葉

foreignData.name: 목줄기 추적자
foreignData.text: 당신이 조종하는 방어되지 않은 공격 중인 닌자들은 생명연결을 가진다.

name: Throatseeker
originalText: Unblocked attacking Ninjas you control have lifelink.

rulings.text: Throatseeker’s effect applies only after blockers have been declared. Before then, attacking creatures are neither blocked nor unblocked.
If an unblocked attacking Ninja you control leaves combat (most likely because the combat phase has ended), it no longer has lifelink.

text: Unblocked attacking Ninjas you control have lifelink.
